attributes.action: Lower the age of Smear Tests to 18.
attributes.additional_details:
Lowering the age to 18 can and will prevent woman dying and familes being destroyed. Will stop children losing their mothers and mothers losing their children. 
This is a serious matter. Smear Tests are life saving. Why are woman being prevented because of their age? 
I urge the age to be lowered with immediate effect to save lifes.
attributes.background: The current age to be able to have a Smear Test is 25. This is too late, women younger than 25 are being diagnosed and have died. This shouldn't even be in question.
